solution_line_template: Olga has half as many blue fish as yellow ones, which means {yellow_fish_count} * {half_factor} = <<{yellow_fish_count}*{half_factor}={blue_fish_count}>>{blue_fish_count} blue fish.
Green fish are twice as many as yellow ones, so in total there are {yellow_fish_count} * {twice_factor} = <<{yellow_fish_count}*{twice_factor}={green_fish_count}>>{green_fish_count} green fish.
So all the fish sum up to {yellow_fish_count} + {blue_fish_count} + {green_fish_count} = <<{yellow_fish_count}+{blue_fish_count}+{green_fish_count}={total_fish_count}>>{total_fish_count}.
